name: Bad Time Simulator - Horrortale
description:
This is a reskin of Jcw87's Bad Time Simulator with a few elements of gotoAndDie's Sans Hard Mode Battle.
Song - TheGamingRemix: "Horrortale Hardlovania"

Reskin - Yours Truly
